bill.title: Planned Community Associations; Notice Requirements; Regular and Special Meetings
bill.description: Creates notice requirements for regular annual meetings and special meetings of a planned community association. (CD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to CPN.
The committee(s) on CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 02-01-13 8:30AM in conference room 229.
The committee(s) on CPN deferred the measure until 02-06-13 9:30AM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 7 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Galuteria, Nishihara, Solomon, Taniguchi, Wakai, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 251) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 02-15-13.
Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 22; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 3 (Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Shimabukuro, Solomon). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 25) in amended form (SD 1).
Pass First Reading
Referred to HSG, CPC, referral sheet 27
Bill scheduled to be heard by HSG on Monday, 03-11-13 9:00AM in House conference room 329.

The committees on HSG recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Cabanilla, Woodson, Belatti, Carroll, Jordan, Kobayashi, Morikawa, Cheape; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from HSG (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 965), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to CPC.
Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on CPC with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Mizuno, Oshiro, Takai excused (3).
Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC on Wednesday, 03-27-13 4:00PM in House conference room 325.
The committee(s) on CPC recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 04-01-13.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Monday, 04-01-13 2:25PM in conference room 325.
The committee(s) on CPC recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 04-03-13.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Wednesday, 04-03-13 2:10PM in conference room 325.

The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) McKelvey, Kawakami, Belatti, Evans, Har, C. Lee, Tsuji, Yamane, McDermott, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 5 Excused: Representative(s) Brower, Cabanilla, Cachola, Carroll, Ito.
Reported from CPC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1557) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday 04-09-13.
Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 528).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 607).
Senate Conferees appointed: Baker, Chair; Galuteria, Slom.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 692).
House conferees appointed: Cabanilla, McKelvey Co-Chairs; Jordan, Ward.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 699).
Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-19-13 11:00AM in conference room 016.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Galuteria, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 4 Ayes: Representative(s) Cabanilla, McKelvey, Jordan, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 7).
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 7) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Friday, 04/25/13.
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 04-25-13.
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). 24 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 1 Excused: Nishihara.
Deferred one day 04-26-13.
Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 747).
Deferred one day 04-30-13.

Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Aquino, Cheape, Coffman, Cullen, Fale, Fukumoto, Har, Ito, Johanson, Kawakami, Lowen, Morikawa, Ohno, Takai, Tokioka, Wooley, Yamane voting no (17) and none excused (0).
Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 761).
Enrolled to Governor.
